title: The Cultivation Of The Maid - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Apocalypse   Appearance Changes   Calm Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Episodic   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Interdimensional Travel   Loyal Subordinates   Maids   Master-Servant Relationship   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Saving the World   Servants   Showbiz   Special Abilities   System Administrator   Transmigration   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   Zombies
author: 同仁坑
description:
[Hello, host, I am the 'heart of loyal servant' system from the three thousand world, numbered A007.]

'Hello, A007. My name is Mei Lu, a maid.'

[The host is the one I found in the three thousand worlds that best meets the conditions of this system. As long as you complete the tasks assigned to you by the clients through the system and earn enough energy, in return, the system will realize any of your wishes. Would you like to bind with me?]

'Bound to you, can you help me find the owner?'

[Of course. As long as there is enough energy, all demands of the host can be realized.]




>
